Uses of Interface
danbikel.parser.WordFeatures

Packages that use WordFeatures
danbikel.parser Provides the core framework of this extensible statistical parsing engine.  
danbikel.parser.arabic Provides language-specific classes necessary to parse Arabic. 
danbikel.parser.chinese Provides language-specific classes necessary to parse Chinese. 
danbikel.parser.lang Provides default abstract base classes for the required interfaces of a language package.  
 

Uses of WordFeatures in danbikel.parser
 

Fields in danbikel.parser declared as WordFeatures
protected  WordFeatures Trainer.wordFeatures
          A handle onto static WordFeatures object contained static inside Language.
 

Methods in danbikel.parser that return WordFeatures
static WordFeatures Language.wordFeatures()
          Gets the WordFeatures object for the current language.
 

Uses of WordFeatures in danbikel.parser.arabic
 

Classes in danbikel.parser.arabic that implement WordFeatures
 class SimpleWordFeatures
          This class simply uses the defaults provided by the class AbstractWordFeatures.
 

Uses of WordFeatures in danbikel.parser.chinese
 

Classes in danbikel.parser.chinese that implement WordFeatures
 class WordFeatures
          WordFeatures are orthographic and morphological features of words.
 

Uses of WordFeatures in danbikel.parser.lang
 

Classes in danbikel.parser.lang that implement WordFeatures
 class AbstractWordFeatures
          Provides a default abstract implementation of the WordFeatures interface.
